# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

| Version | Supported  |
| ------- | -----------|
| 1.0.x   |    ✅      |
| < 1.0   |    ❌      |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

**DO NOT** open a public issue for security vulnerabilities.

Report security issues to: coderdayton14@gmail.com

Include:
- Description of vulnerability
- Steps to reproduce
- Affected versions
- Proposed fix (if any)

You will receive a response within 48 hours.
